title: Mini-Ep 33: Finding Friends and Sephora Samples
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 33: Finding Friends and Sephora Samples
itunes:subtitle: On this week’s mini-episode Kate and Doree continue the conversation about friendship: feeling isolated from old friends, how to make new ones as an adult, and grieving friendships that end poorly. Plus they listen to a voicemail from a listener loving...
description:
On this week’s mini-episode Kate and Doree continue the conversation about friendship: feeling isolated from old friends, how to make new ones as an adult, and grieving friendships that end poorly. Plus they listen to a voicemail from a listener loving that Sephora Sample Life, and discuss what products they've sampled and loved enough to purchase in a full size.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the show at forever35podcast@gmail.com. To learn more, visit forever35podcast.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Care/Of: for 25% off your first month visit takecareof.com and enter FOREVER35 at checkout.
  • Living Proof: Visit LivingProof.com/Forever35 and use promo code FOREVER35 for a free sample of dry shampoo with purchase.
  • Poshmark: Use the invite code DOREESHA for $5 off your first purchase.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
